o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_export_extension_attached
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Creator: WillemOtten
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Comment: Checks if the MDDE LDM Export extension is attached to the model
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:GetMethodScript: Function %Get%(obj) ' Implement your getter method on <obj> here ' and return the value %Get% = False 'Find the export extension Dim extensionObject: Set extensionObject = obj.FindChildByCode ("MDDE_LDM_Export_Extension", Cls_ExtendedModelDefinition, "", Nothing, True, True) %Get% = Not extensionObject is Nothing End Function
o:ExtendedAttributeTargetItem.a:Label: Indicator for export extension
